message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

This paper proposes a method for adapting the policy of robots in changing environments, which is a common problem in robotics and machine learning. The paper focuses on exploration in sparse-reward environments, which is a key challenge in reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses the relationship between the value function and exploration, which is related to control theory and system dynamics, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper uses simulations to evaluate the proposed method, which involves computer vision and image processing, making cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) a possible sub-category as well.
